column2: King Dagon the "Deep One" of Lobsterland conquered most of New England and beyond's coastlines, bringing it under control of the Arboreal faith. Having been said to have lived for over a 100 years, under his rule the Lobsterfolk were all united as one and reigned supreme over the seas, perhaps his descandents may yet again achive this dream.

Maarten van Buren was one of the first Presidents of the Columbian Republican Empire, over hundreds of years ago, who built the Democratic Party. This character is a descendent of him, or at least claims to be one.
